text: The 1935 Volta a Catalunya was the 17th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 1 June to 9 June 1935. The race started and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Mariano Cañardo. == Route and stages == {| class="wikitable" |+List of stages |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Course ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- !
